author: lehors
msg: fixed handling of NOTATION and ENUMERATION attributes

author: andyc
msg: 1) Added textDecl callback to XMLDTDHandler interface. This is so that
we don't lose any information when reading from external parameter
entities.
2) Made the XMLValidator a filter for document, dtd, and dtd content
model events. Modified the XMLDocumentParser to connect the
pipeline as follows:
document events pipeline
XMLDocumentScanner -> XMLValidator -> XMLDocumentParser
dtd and dtd content model events pipeline
XMLDTDScanner -> XMLValidator -> XMLDocumentParser
3) Modified XMLDocumentScanner to actually call the XMLDTDScanner
when a DOCTYPE line is parsed. This code needs to be updated
because we have to properly handle the internal/external subset
parsing and still get the callbacks done correctly.

author: lehors
msg: split scanAttlistDecl in smaller methods

author: lehors
msg: first implementation of scanAttlistDecl,
error messages need to be fixed, the method should really be split in
smaller methods, enumerations need to be built properly...
Still a lot of work to do, but it does seem to scan successfully though!
